basic.blooming: Flowering period during summer and autumn
basic.color: Flower color red, orange; leaf color green with white or pink spots

maintenance.soil: Loose, fertile, and well-drained loam soil
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sufficient sunlight, and resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Fertilize every 15 days during spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
